ground_truth: Cal studies himself in a mirror and picks a shirt. They look through jackets, and Cal is measured for a suit. He opens his wallet and tries on a store trilby. In a jeans store, Jacob looks skywards and marches off, with Cal hurrying after him. Jacob turns back, shrugs, and slaps Cal's cheeks. In a hairdresser's, which is Cal's hairdresser, he steps out in his new garb. Jacob steps confidently over to Cal, and later, they sit in the bar together. Cal shrugs, and Jacob raises his eyebrows as Cal is wearing a sharp blue suit. Jacob and Cal approach a group of women on a couch. Amy looks down awkwardly, then turns away as Jacob points at Cal and she nods. Cal watches Jacob leave with all the different women, including two at the same time. A beautiful dark-haired woman with olive skin heads towards Cal, and he can't take his eyes off her. She wears a low-cut black dress and makes a beeline for him, shakes her silky hair from her face, and Cal smiles. She reaches the table and presents Cal with the bill, revealing they've racked up a bill of $837.57. Cal's smile disappears, and she presses the button, but the page comes out completely black. She screws her eyes shut as a guy spots her and stops, then comes into the room. In a classroom, a teacher writes on the blackboard while Robbie is texting on his mobile. At her locker, Jessica receives the text, frowns, shakes her head, and texts back. Robbie receives the text, stands, and a blonde girl smiles before he sits back down. Emily comes out of the assistant principal's office to Robbie, who is waiting, and they traipse out together. Robbie chuckles softly, Emily smiles, and puts an arm around his shoulder. In her office, Emily types at her computer and glances up as Robbie glides past her desk on an office chair, stopping opposite her. She glances at a photo on the shelf, then looks at Robbie, who shrugs. It's a photo of her and Cal. She lays it face down and turns back to Robbie, frowns, smiles, takes a deep breath, and continues typing. She nods somberly, knits her fingers together, and puts her head against her hands. David smiles, and Robbie shakes his head disapprovingly. Emily heads off, and David swaggers away, then pauses. He turns back and eyes Robbie, who stares back at him impassively. David heads back to Emily's office, glances around, and enters with a grin on his face. David sits, and Robbie pulls a lever under his chair, raising it so he looks down on David. She frowns at David, who waves, and Robbie places the photo of Emily and Cal firmly at the front of his mom's desk and marches out.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Cal examines himself in a looking-glass and selects a top. They glance through coats, and Cal is sized for a tuxedo. He opens his billfold and tries on a shop trilby. In a denim store, Jacob gazes skywards and strides off, with Cal racing after him. Jacob turns back, shrugs, and pats Cal's cheeks. In a barber's, which is Cal's barber, he exits in his new attire. Jacob steps confidently over to Cal, and later, they sit in the pub together. Cal shrugs, and Jacob lifts his eyebrows as Cal is dressed in a sleek azure suit. Jacob and Cal approach a group of females on a sofa. Amy glances down uncomfortably, then turns away as Jacob gestures at Cal and she nods. Cal observes Jacob leaving with all the various females, including two simultaneously. A stunning dark-haired lady with olive complexion heads towards Cal, and he can't take his eyes off her. She dons a low-cut ebony gown and makes a beeline for him, shakes her glossy hair from her face, and Cal grins. She arrives at the table and presents Cal with the check, revealing they've accumulated a bill of $837.57. Cal's grin vanishes, and she presses the button, but the page emerges entirely black. She squeezes her eyes shut as a guy spots her and halts, then enters the room. In a classroom, an educator writes on the chalkboard while Robbie is messaging on his mobile. At her locker, Jessica receives the message, frowns, shakes her head, and messages back. Robbie receives the message, stands, and a blonde girl grins before he sits back down. Emily emerges from the assistant principal's office to Robbie, who is waiting, and they traipse out together. Robbie chuckles quietly, Emily grins, and puts an arm around his shoulders. In her office, Emily types at her computer and glances up as Robbie glides past her desk on an office chair, halting opposite her. She glances at a snapshot on the shelf, then looks at Robbie, who shrugs. It's a snapshot of her and Cal. She lays it face down and turns back to Robbie, frowns, grins, takes a deep breath, and continues typing. She nods somberly, intertwines her fingers together, and places her head against her hands. David grins, and Robbie shakes his head disapprovingly. Emily heads off, and David swaggers away, then pauses. He turns back and eyes Robbie, who stares back at him impassively. David heads back to Emily's office, glances around, and enters with a smile on his face. David sits, and Robbie pulls a lever under his chair, elevating it so he looks down on David. She frowns at David, who waves, and Robbie places the snapshot of Emily and Cal firmly at the front of his mom's desk and marches out.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Cal examines himself in a mirror and selects a shirt. He tries on jackets and gets measured for a suit, then tries on a trilby. At a jeans store, Jacob looks up and walks away, with Cal following. Jacob turns, shrugs, and playfully slaps Cal's cheeks. At a hairdresser's, Cal emerges in new attire. Jacob confidently joins him at the bar, where Cal is now in a sharp blue suit. They approach a group of women; Amy looks down awkwardly as Jacob gestures to Cal, and she nods. Cal watches Jacob leave with various women. A striking dark-haired woman in a low-cut black dress approaches Cal, who can't look away. She presents a bill of $837.57, and Cal's smile fades. She presses a button, but the page is all black. She closes her eyes as a man notices her and enters. In a classroom, a teacher writes on the board while Robbie texts. At her locker, Jessica receives it, frowns, and texts back. A blonde girl smiles at Robbie, who sits back down. Emily exits the assistant principal's office, and she and Robbie leave together. Robbie chuckles, Emily smiles, and puts an arm around him. In her office, Emily types while Robbie glides by on a chair, stopping opposite her. She glances at a photo of her and Cal, lays it face down, and turns back to Robbie. She frowns, smiles, sighs, and resumes typing. She nods somberly and puts her head in her hands. David smiles, and Robbie shakes his head. Emily leaves, and David swags away, then pauses and looks at Robbie, who meets his gaze. David returns to Emily's office, searches, and enters, grinning. David sits, and Robbie raises his chair to tower over him. She frowns at David, who waves, while Robbie places Emily and Cal's photo prominently on the desk and exits.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Cal examines himself in a mirror, selects a shirt, browses jackets, and gets measured for a suit. He tries a trilby after opening his wallet. In a jeans store, Jacob looks up and leaves, with Cal following. Jacob turns, shrugs, and slaps Cal's cheeks. At Cal's hairdresser, he debuts his new outfit. Jacob confidently approaches Cal, and they later sit at a bar. Cal shrugs as Jacob raises his eyebrows at his sharp blue suit. They approach women on a couch. Amy awkwardly looks away as Jacob gestures to Cal, and she nods. Cal sees Jacob leave with multiple women. A beautiful dark-haired woman in a low-cut dress captures Cal's attention. She approaches him, shakes her hair, smiles as she presents a bill of $837.57, causing Cal's smile to fade. She presses a button, but the page turns black. She closes her eyes as a guy notices her and enters. In a classroom, a teacher writes while Robbie texts. Jessica receives it at her locker, frowns, and replies. Robbie gets it, sits down as a blonde girl smiles. Emily exits the assistant principal's office with Robbie, who chuckles as she smiles, putting an arm around his shoulder. In her office, Emily types and looks at Robbie rolling by on a chair, stopping opposite her. She glances at a photo of her and Cal, lays it face down, and turns back to Robbie, frowning then smiling. Emily takes a deep breath, continues typing, nods somberly, and rests her head in her hands. David smiles as Robbie disapproves. Emily leaves, David swaggers but turns back, exchanging looks with Robbie. David returns to Emily's office, grinning, sits, as Robbie raises his chair to look down on him. She frowns at David, who waves, and Robbie firmly places Emily and Cal's photo on her desk and exits.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Cal stands before his reflection in a mirror, meticulously studying his appearance as he thoughtfully picks out a shirt from his collection. As they continue to browse through a selection of jackets, an attendant takes precise measurements of Cal for a suit, ensuring a perfect fit. With a casual flair, Cal opens his wallet and tries on a trilby hat available at the store. Meanwhile, in a nearby jeans store, Jacob gazes upwards toward the ceiling and promptly marches out, with Cal hastening to catch up with him. Jacob abruptly turns around, gives a nonchalant shrug, and, with a playful gesture, lightly slaps Cal's cheeks. 

Inside a hairdresser's establishment—one that Cal frequents—he emerges clad in his newly acquired attire, looking quite transformed. Exhibiting a sense of confidence, Jacob strides over to Cal, and soon afterward, they find themselves seated together in a cozy bar. As Cal gives a nonchalant shrug, Jacob archly raises his eyebrows, seemingly impressed, as Cal is now donning a sharp, impeccably tailored blue suit. Together, they approach a group of women sitting comfortably on a couch. Amy appears slightly uneasy, looking down awkwardly before averting her gaze, while Jacob directs attention toward Cal and she acknowledges with a nod. 

Cal observes with keen interest as Jacob departs with a variety of women, at one point leaving with two at the same time. Among the crowd, a stunning woman catches Cal's attention; she possesses dark hair and olive skin, exuding beauty and elegance. Cal finds himself unable to tear his eyes away from her as she confidently approaches him. Clad in a low-cut black dress, she moves directly toward him, gracefully shaking her silky hair away from her face, prompting Cal to smile in admiration. Upon reaching his table, she presents Cal with the bill, which, to his surprise, totals a staggering $837.57. Cal's smile fades at this revelation, and when she presses the button to print, the page emerges entirely black. She grimaces, shutting her eyes tightly as a man notices her and pauses before entering the room.

In a classroom setting, a teacher is diligently writing on the blackboard while Robbie is absorbed in texting on his mobile phone. At her locker, Jessica receives the text, frowns in confusion, shakes her head, and promptly texts back a response. Upon receiving her reply, Robbie stands up from his seat while a blonde girl offers him a smile before he sits back down. Emily emerges from the assistant principal's office to find Robbie waiting for her, and together they walk out. Robbie chuckles softly, which prompts Emily to smile as she affectionately wraps an arm around his shoulder. At her office desk, Emily types away at her computer, glancing up briefly as Robbie slides by on an office chair, halting across from her. She glances at a photograph occupying a spot on the shelf, then looks at Robbie, who simply shrugs. The photo is of her and Cal. She carefully lays it face down and turns her attention back to Robbie, frowning, then smiles, takes a deep breath, and continues tapping at her keyboard. 

She nods somberly, intertwines her fingers, and rests her head in her hands. David enters the scene with a smile, causing Robbie to shake his head in disapproval. As Emily departs, David struts away yet comes to a sudden stop. He turns to look back at Robbie, who meets his gaze with an unwavering stare. David makes his way back into Emily's office, casting a quick look around before entering with a grin. He takes a seat, and Robbie, with a quick motion, pulls a lever under his chair, elevating his position so he looks down on David. She directs a frown at David, who waves in return, while Robbie resolutely places the photograph of Emily and Cal prominently on his mother's desk before he exits with determination.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
Cal stands before his own reflection in a mirror, meticulously studying every aspect of his appearance as he thoughtfully selects a shirt from his extensive collection. As he continues to browse through a wide array of jackets, an attentive store attendant takes precise measurements of Cal for a suit, ensuring an absolutely perfect fit. With a casual flair, Cal opens his wallet and tries on a trilby hat that happens to be available at the store. Meanwhile, in a nearby jeans store, Jacob finds himself gazing upwards toward the ceiling before promptly deciding to march out, with Cal hastening to catch up with him. Jacob then abruptly turns around, gives a nonchalant shrug, and, with a playful gesture, lightly slaps Cal's cheeks, adding a touch of humor to the moment.

Inside a hairdresser's establishment—one that Cal frequents—he emerges looking quite transformed, now clad in his newly acquired attire. Exhibiting a newfound sense of confidence, Jacob strides over to Cal, and soon afterward, they find themselves seated together in a cozy bar. As Cal gives a nonchalant shrug, Jacob archly raises his eyebrows, seemingly impressed by Cal’s transformation, as he is now sporting a sharp, impeccably tailored blue suit. Together, they approach a group of women sitting comfortably on a couch. Amy appears slightly uneasy, looking down awkwardly before averting her gaze, while Jacob directs attention toward Cal and she acknowledges with a nod of recognition.

Cal observes with keen interest as Jacob departs with a variety of women, at one point managing to leave with two at the same time. Among the lively crowd, a stunning woman catches Cal's attention; she possesses dark hair and olive skin, exuding a captivating blend of beauty and elegance. Cal finds himself unable to tear his eyes away from her as she confidently approaches him. Dressed in a low-cut black dress, she moves directly toward him, gracefully shaking her silky hair away from her face, prompting Cal to smile in admiration. Upon reaching his table, she presents Cal with the bill, which, to his utter surprise, totals a staggering $837.57. Cal's smile fades at this unexpected revelation, and when she presses the button to print, the page emerges entirely black. She grimaces, shutting her eyes tightly as a man notices her and pauses momentarily before entering the room.

In a classroom setting, a teacher is diligently writing on the blackboard while Robbie is absorbed in texting on his mobile phone. At her locker, Jessica receives the text, frowns in confusion, shakes her head, and promptly texts back a response. Upon receiving her reply, Robbie stands up from his seat while a blonde girl offers him a friendly smile before he sits back down. Emily emerges from the assistant principal's office to find Robbie waiting for her, and together they walk out. Robbie chuckles softly, which prompts Emily to smile as she affectionately wraps an arm around his shoulder. At her office desk, Emily types away at her computer, glancing up briefly as Robbie slides by on an office chair, coming to a halt across from her. She glances at a photograph occupying a spot on the shelf, then looks at Robbie, who simply shrugs. The photo is of her and Cal. She carefully lays it face down and turns her attention back to Robbie, frowning. Then, with a smile, she takes a deep breath and continues tapping away at her keyboard.

She nods somberly, intertwines her fingers, and rests her head in her hands. David enters the scene with a smile on his face, causing Robbie to shake his head in disapproval. As Emily departs, David struts away yet suddenly comes to an abrupt stop. He turns to look back at Robbie, who meets his gaze with an unwavering stare. David makes his way back into Emily's office, casting a quick look around before entering with a grin. He takes a seat, and Robbie, with a swift motion, pulls a lever under his chair, elevating his position so he looks down on David. She directs a frown at David, who waves in return, while Robbie resolutely places the photograph of Emily and Cal prominently on his mother's desk before he exits with determination and purpose.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Cal stands in front of a mirror, focusing intently on his reflection while contemplating his appearance. He scrutinizes himself, evaluating which shirt might suit him best, and eventually settles on one. With his choice made, Cal turns his attention to a selection of jackets, weighing his options with care before being guided through the meticulous process of being measured for a suit. The tailor takes precise measurements, ensuring everything will fit perfectly. Afterwards, Cal reaches into his pocket, retrieves his wallet, and opens it as he tries on a trilby hat from the store, assessing how it complements his ensemble. Meanwhile, in a jeans store, Jacob, who is accompanying Cal, pauses to look upwards, seemingly lost in thought or plotting their next move. Without warning, Jacob strides purposefully out of the store, and Cal, not wanting to be left behind, hastily follows in his wake. As Jacob walks ahead, he suddenly stops, turns around, and shrugs in a nonchalant gesture before playfully giving Cal's cheeks a light slap, a friendly gesture to lift his spirits. The scene shifts to a hairdresser's salon, which happens to be Cal's regular place, and he emerges transformed in his new outfit, feeling a newfound sense of confidence. Jacob approaches Cal with an assertive step, signaling approval. Later, they find themselves seated together at a bar, where Cal can't help but shrug as Jacob raises his eyebrows, seemingly impressed by Cal's sharp blue suit. The two friends then make their way over to a group of women lounging on a couch. Among them, Amy, feeling slightly uneasy, glances downward awkwardly before turning away when Jacob confidently points towards Cal, and she responds with a nod of recognition. Cal observes as Jacob effortlessly mingles with various women, even managing to charm two at once. Soon, a strikingly beautiful woman with dark hair and olive skin enters the scene, capturing Cal's attention completely. Her allure is undeniable as she heads directly towards him, wearing a stunning low-cut black dress. She tosses her silky hair from her face, and Cal can't help but smile. She closes the distance to his table, her presence commanding his attention, and hands him the bill, revealing the significant amount they've accumulated—$837.57. Cal's smile quickly fades in response to the hefty sum. She attempts to process the payment, but the receipt prints out entirely black, leaving her flustered. She clenches her eyes shut, clearly distressed, just as another man spots her predicament and makes his way into the room. The scene transitions to a classroom where a teacher diligently writes on the blackboard while Robbie, one of the students, is discreetly texting on his mobile phone. Meanwhile, Jessica stands at her locker, receiving Robbie's text, and reacts by frowning, shaking her head slightly before sending a text back to him. Upon reading her reply, Robbie stands up, acknowledging the message, while a blonde girl offers him a friendly smile before he returns to his seat. The focus shifts to Emily, who emerges from the assistant principal's office to find Robbie waiting for her, and together they exit the building, walking side by side. As they leave, Robbie chuckles softly, and Emily smiles warmly, wrapping an arm around his shoulder in a gesture of support. Later, in her office, Emily is busy typing at her computer. She momentarily glances up to see Robbie entertaining himself by gliding past her desk on an office chair, eventually stopping opposite her. Her attention is drawn to a photo on the shelf, prompting her to take a thoughtful look at the image of her and Cal before laying it face down on the desk. Emily returns her focus to Robbie, who responds with a shrug. She frowns, momentarily lost in thought, then smiles, taking a deep breath before resuming her work. She thoughtfully nods, laces her fingers together, and rests her head against her hands, processing the situation. Meanwhile, David enters, wearing a smile, but Robbie regards him with disapproval, shaking his head. As Emily departs, David strikes a confident pose, turning around to catch Robbie's eye, locking their gazes in a silent exchange. David then proceeds to Emily's office, surveying the room with a grin before taking a seat. Unfazed, Robbie approaches David, pulls a lever under his chair to adjust the height, ensuring he can look down on David, asserting his presence. Emily casts a disapproving look at David, who offers a casual wave, while Robbie, firmly asserting himself, places the photo of Emily and Cal prominently at the front of his mother's desk before making a decisive exit from the office.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Cal examines his reflection, selects a shirt, and checks out jackets before being measured for a suit. He tries on a trilby from his wallet. Meanwhile, Jacob, in a jeans store, heads out abruptly, with Cal following. Jacob turns, pats Cal's cheeks, and they proceed to Cal's hairdresser. Cal emerges in a sharp blue suit, prompting Jacob to raise his eyebrows. They head to a bar, where Cal's attire gains attention as Jacob gestures toward him in front of Amy, who nods. Jacob mingles with multiple women while Cal is captivated by a striking, dark-haired woman in a black dress approaching him. She hands him a bill of $837.57, wiping away Cal's smile, and struggles with a faulty receipt printout. In a classroom, Robbie texts, receiving a reply from Jessica, who shakes her head. Robbie's smile grows as he sits back down. Later, he meets Emily outside the assistant principal's office, and they leave together, sharing a light moment. In her office, Emily notices a photo of herself with Cal before turning her attention to Robbie, who casually rolls by on an office chair. Emily regards the photo, then resumes work, balancing introspection with a smile. David and Robbie exchange non-verbal cues as David approaches Emily's office, and Robbie strategically places the photo prominently on Emily's desk before exiting.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Cal examines himself in a mirror, contemplating his reflection with the same scrutiny that artists use when inspecting their work, and picks a shirt. They sift through a collection of jackets that reflect the latest trends in fashion, and Cal is measured for a suit by a tailor renowned for crafting bespoke outfits. He opens his wallet, revealing a faded photo tucked away in its folds, and tries on a store trilby, a hat style that gained popularity in the early 20th century. In a jeans store, Jacob looks skywards at the array of jeans displayed above and marches off with a determined stride, with Cal hurrying after him. Jacob turns back with the casualness of a seasoned friend, shrugs, and playfully slaps Cal's cheeks. In a hairdresser's, which Cal frequents for his monthly trims, he steps out in his new garb. Jacob steps confidently over to Cal, and later, they sit in a bar known for its eclectic cocktails together. Cal shrugs, and Jacob raises his eyebrows, impressed, as Cal is wearing a sharp blue suit tailored to perfection. Jacob and Cal approach a group of women lounging on a plush couch. Amy, sitting with a cocktail in hand, looks down awkwardly, then turns away as Jacob points at Cal and she nods, acknowledging his transformation. Cal watches, slightly bemused, as Jacob effortlessly charms all the different women, including two at the same time, showcasing his magnetism. A beautiful dark-haired woman with olive skin, reminiscent of classic film stars, heads towards Cal, and he can't take his eyes off her. She wears a low-cut black dress that accentuates her elegance and makes a beeline for him, shakes her silky hair from her face as though performing in a shampoo commercial, and Cal smiles. She reaches the table and presents Cal with the bill, revealing they've racked up a considerable tab of $837.57 at the upscale establishment. Cal's smile disappears, and she presses the button on the register, but the page comes out completely black, a frustrating malfunction. She screws her eyes shut as a guy, known for his penchant for drama, spots her and stops, then comes into the room with a flourish. In a classroom, a teacher writes on the blackboard while Robbie, engrossed in his digital world, is texting on his mobile. At her locker, Jessica receives the text, frowns at the unexpected message, shakes her head, and texts back a quick response. Robbie receives the text, stands with anticipation, and a blonde girl, whose laughter often fills the hallways, smiles before he sits back down. Emily comes out of the assistant principal's office to Robbie, who is waiting with a patient demeanor, and they traipse out together. Robbie chuckles softly, Emily, with her warm and calming presence, smiles, and puts an arm around his shoulder in a comforting gesture. In her office, Emily types at her computer, a touchstone of her daily routine, and glances up as Robbie glides past her desk on an office chair, stopping opposite her like a mischievous child. She glances at a photo on the shelf, then looks at Robbie, who shrugs in his usual nonchalant manner. It's a photo of her and Cal, captured during a trip to the beachfront last summer. She lays it face down and turns back to Robbie, frowns, smiles, takes a deep breath, and continues typing with renewed focus. She nods somberly, knits her fingers together in contemplation, and puts her head against her hands in thought. David smiles, with the charm of someone who always has a twinkle in his eye, and Robbie shakes his head disapprovingly, his expression mirroring that of a disapproving sibling. Emily heads off, and David swaggers away with the confidence of someone who rarely questions his direction, then pauses. He turns back and eyes Robbie, who stares back at him impassively, a silent challenge hanging in the air. David heads back to Emily's office, glances around to ensure the coast is clear, and enters with a grin on his face that suggests he knows a secret. David sits, and Robbie pulls a lever under his chair with a sense of authority, raising it so he looks down on David, a power play in their ongoing banter. She frowns at David, who waves with a casual air, and Robbie places the photo of Emily and Cal firmly at the front of his mom's desk, a silent reminder, and marches out with a decisive step.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Cal studies himself in a mirror and picks a shirt. They look through jackets and Cal is measured for a suit. He opens his wallet and tries on a store trilby. In a jeans store Jacob looks skywards and marches off with Cal hurrying after him. Jacob turns back shrugs and slaps Cal's cheeks. In a hairdresser's which is Cal's hairdresser he steps out in his new garb. Jacob steps confidently over to Cal and later they sit in the bar together. Cal shrugs and Jacob raises his eyebrows as Cal is wearing a sharp blue suit. Jacob and Cal approach a group of women on a couch. Amy looks down awkwardly then turns away as Jacob points at Cal and she nods. Cal watches Jacob leave with all the different women including two at the same time. A beautiful darkhaired woman with olive skin heads towards Cal and he cannot take his eyes off her. She wears a lowcut black dress and makes a beeline for him shakes her silky hair from her face and Cal smiles. She reaches the table and presents Cal with the bill revealing they have racked up a bill of 83757. Cal's smile disappears and she presses the button but the page comes out completely black. She screws her eyes shut as a guy spots her and stops then comes into the room. In a classroom a teacher writes on the blackboard while Robbie is texting on his mobile. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. At her locker Jessica receives the text frowns shakes her head and texts back. Robbie receives the text stands and a blonde girl smiles before he sits back down. Emily comes out of the assistant principal's office to Robbie who is waiting and they traipse out together. Robbie chuckles softly. Emily smiles and puts an arm around his shoulder. In her office Emily types at her computer and glances up as Robbie glides past her desk on an office chair stopping opposite her. She glances at a photo on the shelf then looks at Robbie who shrugs. It is a photo of her and Cal. She lays it face down and turns back to. Robbie frowns smiles takes a deep breath and continues typing. She nods somberly knits her fingers together and puts her head against her hands. David smiles and Robbie shakes his head disapprovingly. Emily heads off and David swaggers away then pauses. He turns back and eyes Robbie who stares back at him impassively. David heads back to Emily's office glances around and enters with a grin on his face. David sits and Robbie pulls a lever under his chair raising it so he looks down on David. She frowns at David who waves and Robbie places the photo of Emily and Cal firmly at the front of his mom's desk and marches out.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Cal studies himself in a mirror and picks a shirt. They look through jackets and Cal is measured for a suit. He opens his wallet and tries on a store trilby. In a jeans store Jacob looks skywards and marches off with Cal hurrying after him. Jacob turns back shrugs and slaps Cal's cheeks. In a hairdresser's which is Cal's hairdresser he steps out in his new garb. Jacob steps confidently over to Cal and later they sit in the bar together. Cal shrugs and Jacob raises his eyebrows as Cal is wearing a sharp blue suit. Jacob and Cal approach a group of women on a couch. Amy looks down awkwardly then turns away as Jacob points at Cal and she nods. Cal watches Jacob leave with all the different women including two at the same time. A beautiful darkhaired woman with olive skin heads towards Cal and he cannot take his eyes off her. She wears a lowcut black dress and makes a beeline for him shakes her silky hair from her face and Cal smiles. She reaches the table and presents Cal with the bill revealing they have racked up a bill of 83757. Cal's smile disappears and she presses the button but the page comes out completely black. She screws her eyes shut as a guy spots her and stops then comes into the room. In a classroom a teacher writes on the blackboard while Robbie is texting on his mobile. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Rex inspects a shadow in a pond and selects a tie. They sift through shoes, and Rex is weighed for a bicycle. He closes his suitcase and plants a flag on a market sombrero. In a shorts stall, Lewis gazes earthward and glides away, with Rex sneezing behind him. Lewis twirls around, winks, and bops Rex's elbows. In a bakery, which is Rex's bakery, he wanders in with his old attire. Lewis stomps hesitantly over to Rex, and earlier, they stand on the hill separately. Rex coughs, and Lewis wiggles his ears as Rex is sporting a dull green jacket. Lewis and Rex avoid a pack of puppies on a slide. Eva glances up confidently, then bounces toward as Lewis laughs at Rex and she yawns. Rex listens as Lewis arrives with all the identical robots, excluding four at the same moment. A striking blue-eyed giant with ivory scales strolls past Rex, and he hides his face from her. She wears a tall wooly red hat and zigzags to him, tosses her tangled robe from her hands, and Rex frowns. She lifts the bag and offers Rex a balloon, unveiling they've collected a balloon of 29 rocks. Rex's frown brightens, and she presses the light, but the speaker comes out absolutely silent. She opens her mouth wide as a turtle sees her and sprints, then dances out of the cave. In a laboratory, a scientist draws on the ceiling while Max is painting on his easel. At his drawer, Olivia sends a package, smiles, claps her hands, and calls back. Max sends the package, collapses, and a tall boy cries after he runs far away. Olivia rushes out of the janitor's closet to Max, who is napping, and they saunter in separately. Max whispers loudly, Olivia frowns, and throws a scarf over his shoe. In his garage, Olivia hops on her typewriter and giggles down as Max swims past her car on a skateboard wheel, zooming beside her. She squints at a statue on the chair, then stares at Max, who sneezes. It's a statue of him and Rex. She flips it upright and turns back to Max, yawns, frowns, takes a shallow breath, and continues hopping. She shakes joyfully, braids her toes together, and puts her ear against her feet. Michael frowns, and Max claps his hands approvingly. Olivia skips away, and Michael slides toward, then dances. He skips away and glares at Max, who grins back at him sadly. Michael skips toward Olivia's garage, dances around, and exits with a tear on his cheek. Michael stands, and Max presses a button above his bed, flattening it so he glares upward at Michael. She smiles at Michael, who claps, and Max hides the statue of Olivia and Rex stealthily at the back of his dad's drawer and tiptoes in.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description:
Cal examines himself in a mirror, selecting a shirt, trying on a trilby, and getting measured for a suit. At a jeans store, Jacob leaves, prompting Cal to follow hastily. At Cal's hairdresser, Cal emerges in a sharp blue suit. Later, they sit at a bar, where Jacob and Cal approach women. Jacob leaves with various women, while Cal is captivated by a dark-haired woman who ends up presenting him with a steep bill of $837.57, dampening his smile.

Meanwhile, Robbie texts Jessica in class. She responds, and Robbie sits back down, exchanging smiles with a blonde girl. Emily exits the assistant principal's office with Robbie, who later glides by her desk on an office chair. Noticing a photo of her and Cal, Emily hides it and resumes typing, contemplating somberly. David smiles at Robbie, who disapproves, as Emily departs. David returns, enters Emily's office grinning, and Robbie adjusts his chair to look down at him. Robbie then places the photo of Emily and Cal prominently on her desk before leaving.
